description: Is there anything more satisfying than crispy schnitzel? Try this schnitzel recipe that uses leftover hot cross buns in the crumb to achieve that sought after crisp.
keywords: Hot cross buns,Seafood free,Easter leftovers,Apple,Pork,Autumn,Easter,Apr 2021,Peanut free
name: Hot Cross Bun Pork Schnitzels Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 leftover indulgent apple & cinnamon hot cross bun, roughly chopped
2 small fennel bulbs, trimmed, thinly sliced
1 small red apple, thinly sliced into rounds
0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place hot cross bun in a food processor and process until fine crumbs form. Add parmesan and process until mixture is just combined. Transfer to a large plate. Place flour on a separate plate and place egg in a shallow bowl.
Working with one steak at a time, coat in flour, then dip in egg and finish by coating in crumb mixture. Place on a baking tray.

Place oil in a large frying pan until 5mm up side of pan. Heat over medium-high heat. Cook schnitzels, in batches, for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
Meanwhile, place fennel, apple, parsley and dressing in a large bowl. Toss gently to combine. Divide salad among plates, top with schnitzel, season and serve.
